## Buckets.links() method

Returns a list of bucket links.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
links(key: string, ctx?: ContextInterface): Promise<pb.LinksReply.AsObject>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Unique (IPNS compatible) identifier key for a bucket. |
|  ctx | ContextInterface | Context object containing web-gRPC headers and settings. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;pb.LinksReply.AsObject&gt;
